reviewText: Some beautiful cars and some reckless driving but all in fun and entertainment. Nice to see how the other 3% lives.
Fun reminder of the good old days!
Love all the super speeders dvds. Matt and Rob are great. I know it takes alot to put these videos together.

While this may be a "self promotion" Ferretti and his crew live the kind of life that most of us can only dream about. Until my monthly automotive budget allows me to buy more then just a tire for one of these cars I will continue to watch these movies with a smile.

This was mostly self promotion at the viewers expense (both in time and payment). I was expecting to see a showcase of drivers and their machines. I thought there would be plenty of exotics, e.g. the Ferrari line up - 348s, the famous 355s, 360s on up as well as Lams and Maseratis and whatever else. But no this is mostly about the Ferretti Productions owner and "his" Lamborghini. Of course, there is a sprinkling of everyone else's vehicle here and there but not enough to make it other than self promotion.
Do not buy this video, throw your $20 bill out the window instead and at least you won't waste 90 minutes of your life watching this junk.  You can download better clips from youtube for free.
